snippet.title: AMBER HEARD Says JOHNNY DEPP Threatened Her Life
snippet.description:
Amber Heard took to the stand yesterday and said that Johnny Depp threatened her life and that the only way out was death.

Do you believe her?

I WANT YOU!! Hit that Subscribe Button for more News & Movie Reviews: http://www.youtube.com/c/StevieJMovieReviews sub_confirmation=1

Share this video with a friend:https://youtu.be/lMRWfbyDUyw

Watch next – ACTION PLAYLIST: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V67lRefAj34&list=PLjlZhWKK8GVQEMiQ967zF3QhtPVSnHgTz

Recommended Playlist – COMPILATIONS PLAYLIST : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1_6J04dtQwg&list=PLjlZhWKK8GVSTUEsa__41iQhEHb0Nsqmn

Amber Heard sensationally claimed today Johnny Depp threatened to “kill her many times” during explosive drug-fuelled rows.

The Aquaman star, 34, has taken to the stand as she lifts the lid on her turbulent marriage – claiming Depp attacked her 14 times over three years.

In her witness statement given to the High Court, Heard told how Depp would threaten to “carve” her face up if she ever left him or hurt him and said he ”controlled” her life.

She said: “He explicitly threatened to kill me many times. He would blame all his actions on a self-created third person, which he often called The Monster.

“He talked about our relationship being ‘dead or alive’ and told me that death was the only way out of the relationship.

Let’s connect:

Twitter - https://twitter.com/StevieJReviews

THANKS FOR WATCHING!!
#AmberHeard #JusticeForJohnnyDepp #JohnnyDeppAmberHeard
